version_description: 【Fix】Fix some bugs.
【Fix】Fix some bugs.

【新增】视频播放器新增添加字幕(SRT)功能。
【新增】大图浏览时新增删除按钮。
【新增】港澳、台湾地区,也可浏览视频、音乐资源。
【修复】修复搜索文件后,删除等操作偶现异常闪退的问题。

【评论】敬爱的客户,有任何问题或者期待加入新功能,您可以在AppStore留言评论,产品小妹不定期查阅并反馈给程序猿哥哥哦。

【新增】视频播放器新增添加字幕(SRT)功能。
【新增】大图浏览时新增删除按钮。
【新增】港澳、台湾地区,也可浏览视频、音乐资源。
【修复】修复搜索文件后,删除等操作偶现异常闪退的问题。

【评论】敬爱的客户,有任何问题或者期待加入新功能,您可以在AppStore留言评论,产品小妹不定期查阅并反馈给程序猿哥哥哦。

【Add】Add new video player compatibility mode. MP4 video is not standardized for teaching classes.
【Repair】Repair English translation problem.

【Add】Add new video player compatibility mode. MP4 video is not standardized for teaching classes.
【Repair】Repair English translation problem.

We modify these bug:
1. it may be abnormal when you import your cell phone photos.
2. when the page switches, the button bouncing problem.

We modify these bug:
1. it may be abnormal when you import your cell phone photos.
2. when the page switches, the button bouncing problem.

This update:
- Added Japanese support.
- Function detail optimization.
- File loading optimization.

You can also rate and comment on it, and we will actively help you with any issues.

This update:
- Added Japanese support.
- Function detail optimization.
- File loading optimization.

You can also rate and comment on it, and we will actively help you with any issues.

This update:
- Added video speed playback
   The default 1.0x is normal speed, and the speed range is: [0.1x-4.0x]
- File processing optimization

If you encounter any problems, you can write a message in the ratings and comments, or contact customer service for support.

This update:
- Added video speed playback
   The default 1.0x is normal speed, and the speed range is: [0.1x-4.0x]
- File processing optimization

If you encounter any problems, you can write a message in the ratings and comments, or contact customer service for support.

This update:
- Import local and iCloud photos more intuitively and conveniently.
- Modify the preview size limit from the original 25MB to 40MB.
- File processing optimization

If you have any questions, you can write a message in the ratings and comments, or contact customer service for support.

If you have any questions, you can write a message in the ratings and comments, or contact customer service for support.

This update:
- Modify the problem of importing images on lower version systems.

- File processing optimization
If you have any questions, you can write a message in the ratings and comments, or contact customer service for support.

This update:
- View photos, support horizontal and vertical screen.
- Added video playback progress record, jump to the last position directly next time.
- Correct some English translation problems.

Any questions can be written in ratings and comments, or open APP->Settings->About to get Technical Support.

This update:
- View photos, support horizontal and vertical screen.
- Added video playback progress record, jump to the last position directly next time.
- Correct some English translation problems.

Any questions can be written in ratings and comments, or open APP->Settings->About to get Technical Support.

This update:
-Adapt to iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR.
-Cancel positioning dialog.
-Solve the problem of imported photos being lost or garbled.

-Adapt to iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR.

This update:
- Support screen rotation
- Support iCloud photo & video import

If you have any questions, you can write a message in the ratings and comments to get Technical Support.

This update:
- Fix 13 new system working abnormalities

Dear users:
Thanks for the support we have always had, any problems encountered in the use of the app can be written in the AppStore, which is the fastest channel for engineers to see and solve.
